name: spell-check
description: Highlights misspelled words and shows possible corrections.

grammars.description: List of scopes for languages which will be checked for misspellings. See [the README](https://github.com/pulsar-edit/pulsar/blob/master/packages/spell-check/README.md) for more information on finding the correct scope for a specific language.

excludedScopes.description: List of sub-scopes that will be ignored. Specify the most detailed scope to avoid ignoring otherwise relevant text. The scopes will be parsed as regular expressions. See [the README](https://github.com/pulsar-edit/pulsar/blob/master/packages/spell-check/README.md) for more information on finding the correct scope for a specific language.

useSystem.description: If checked, use the built-in spell checking on macOS and some versions of Windows. This setting is ignored on Linux, even if checked.

useLocales.description: If checked, then the locales below will be used for checking.

locales.description: List of locales to use for the system spell-checking. Examples would be `en-US` or `de-DE`. If this is blank, then the default language for the user will be used.

localePaths.description: List of additional paths to search for dictionary files when checking using locales. If a locale cannot be found in these, the internal code will attempt to find it using common search paths.

knownWords.description: List words that are considered correct even if they do not appear in any other dictionary. Words with capitals or ones that start with `!` are case-sensitive.

addKnownWords.description: If checked, then the suggestions will include options to add to the known words list above.

noticesMode.description: Choose where loading errors and other notices are displayed: popup, console, or both.

enum.description: Display notices in popups and in the console
Display notices only on the console

enableDebug.title: Enable debug information for spell check
